title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a Java editor is opened, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler does not result in a popup menu. This menu is expected to provide options to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: The Java editor should display a popup menu when the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler. The menu should include options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is a popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints or marks.
